2+1.sig_info: Either Combat Power Rate is enhanced by up to 8 to 30.02%, or enemies suffer 8 to 30.02% reduced Combat Power Rate. This cycles every 6 hours.

PASSIVE: Withheld from Death herself by the Egyptian Moon-god Khonshu, Marc Spector’s power ebbs and flows based on the phase of the Moon.
ALL ATTACKS: As the Moon waxes, boost Critical Rating by 788.06 for 3 seconds with up to a 8% chance. The chance increases nearer to the Full Moon.
As the Moon wanes, gain 37.35 Fury for 5 seconds with up to a 10% chance. The chance increases nearer to the New Moon.
CRITICAL HITS: Under the light of the Full Moon, Critical Hits have a 15% chance to Stun for 3 seconds.
Critical Hits lacerate opponents with a 70% chance, inflicting 45.65 Bleed damage over 3 seconds.
WHEN ATTACKED: In the darkness of a New Moon, evade attacks with a 5% chance.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: This attack receives 400 additional Critical Rating.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Any Bleed effects triggered by this attack have 50% increased duration.
